name: Footy (Martin Piper)
description:
MonstersGoBoom made some Football player sprites for Commodore 64. It made me want to try a quick tech demo: https://twitter.com/MartinPiper/status/1335050778436718593?s=20

If you like this demo, then please do send a donation as it indicates interest in a particular project.

Joystick in port 2
Hold down fire to control the ball and move slowly with it. This also alters the shot strength shown in the top left of the screen. Release fire and run into the ball to kick with the strength.
Without fire held down, the ball will just be tapped ahead of the player based on their movement.

The cartridge is used to allow full screen fast scrolling. The multiplexor maintains sprite "perspective" ordering as best as it can.
